type: Tutorial Step - The Beauty of the Triangle

definition.text: I'm sure you would agree that the triangle is a quick visual clue to grasp how the trade went in a glimpse!

paragraphs.text: That's one of the core ideas behind these visualization features: quick and effective communication.
The second core idea is that—by being able to see what went on with the session—it is easier to spot the weaknesses in your strategies, and how you may be able to improve them!
On a side note, notice that the data displayed on panels is the same data available on the Trading Engine hierarchy.
